TopicTitle: Bare minimum to get into orbit

Articles.Content:
I found a bare minimum rocket to get into orbit:

KW Rocketry Vesta VR1

FL-T800 Fuel Tank

Kerbal Engineering System

Inline Reaction Wheel

2x3 Solar Panel

Z-100 Battery

OKTO2 Command Module

Mass: 5.463 t

Fuel: 360

Oxidizer: 440

Delta-V: 4525 m/s

Thrust: 120 KN

Isp: 350 s

TWR: 2.21

On an earlier test, I didn't have the battery or the solar panel and the command module lost power and Mechjeb couldn't make the circularization burn. I could possibly keep just the solar panel and drop the battery, but it would only save me 0.005 t.

Edited October 29, 2013 by neamerjell

You would be surprised how little it takes to get somewhere

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36419-Smallest-Craft-to-Various-Milestones

I got into orbit with:

-1 jet

-2 radial intake

-2 cubic strut

-1 standard decoupler

-1 22-7s

-3 oscar-b

-1 45 unit 1m tank

-1 static panel

-1 command chair

-
